data.name: War Thunder - F-5C Pack
data.detailed_description:
Note!

To activate this DLC for your Gaijin account, it has to be linked to Steam account that made the purchase. If you aren't sure it is, please follow the instruction. If you still have any questions, contact our support (login on the same website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

This Pack includes:

  • Fighter F-5C (Rank 6 USA);
  • Premium account for 15 days;
  • 2000 Golden Eagles.

F-5C

The Northrop F-5C Skoshi Tiger fighter is a modified version of the F-5A that was sent to Southeast Asia in the mid-1960’s for an F-5 evaluation program in real combat conditions. The aircraft was modified to mount a fuelling boom for refueling during flight, armouring of several fuselage sections were also added, and the cockpit instrumentation was updated. The premium F-5C is capable of reaching a top speed of over 1400 km/h. The fighter is armed with two 20mm M39A2 revolver cannons. Suspended armament is presented in various options, including: 2 AIM-9B/E Sidewinder guided air-to-air missiles, up to four AGM-12B guided air-to-surface missiles, up to 76 FFAR Mighty Mouse unguided rockets, up to 8 Zuni Mk32 unguided rockets, and also be able to carry up to 18 250lb, five 750lb, five 500lb, three 1000lb, or one 2000lb bombs in various combinations. In addition, the F-5C fighter is equipped with flares and chaff as infrared and radar countermeasures.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!
  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.

This Pack includes:

  • Fighter F-5C (Rank 6 USA);

  • 2000 Golden Eagles.

F-5C

The Northrop F-5C Skoshi Tiger fighter is a modified version of the F-5A that was sent to Southeast Asia in the mid-1960’s for an F-5 evaluation program in real combat conditions. The aircraft was modified to mount a fuelling boom for refueling during flight, armouring of several fuselage sections were also added, and the cockpit instrumentation was updated. The premium F-5C is capable of reaching a top speed of over 1400 km/h. The fighter is armed with two 20mm M39A2 revolver cannons. Suspended armament is presented in various options, including: 2 AIM-9B/E Sidewinder guided air-to-air missiles, up to four AGM-12B guided air-to-surface missiles, up to 76 FFAR Mighty Mouse unguided rockets, up to 8 Zuni Mk32 unguided rockets, and also be able to carry up to 18 250lb, five 750lb, five 500lb, three 1000lb, or one 2000lb bombs in various combinations. data.short_description: This Pack includes: Fighter F-5C (Rank 6 USA);Premium account for 15 days;2000 Golden Eagles.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Russian*, Japanese*, Polish*, Czech*, Turkish*, Portuguese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Ukrainian, Traditional Chinese, Romanian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1/8/10
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4GB (Windows Vista/7/8/10)
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.1 level video card: AMD Radeon 77XX / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660. The minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p.
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Ryzen 5 3600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 level video card or higher and drivers: Nvidia GeForce 1060 and higher, Radeon RX 570 and higher
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina v.10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 5200 (Mac), or analog from AMD/Nvidia for Mac. Minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p with Metal support
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Big Sur v. 10.16 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Vega II or higher with Metal support.
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most modern 64bit Linux distributions
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 660 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months; the minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p) with Vulkan support.
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1060 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD (Radeon RX 560) with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) with Vulkan support.
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
